verses.verse: לַמְנַצֵּ֣חַ <S%H5329><s%> lam-natz-Tze-acho the chief Musician אַל־ [T'al- תַּ֭שְׁחֵת <S%H516><s%> Tash-chet Altaschith לְדָוִ֣ד <S%H1732><s%> le-da-Vid of David מִכְתָּ֑ם <S%H4387><s%> mich-Tam; Michtam בְּבָרְח֥וֹ <S%H1272><s%> be-va-re-Cho when he fled מִפְּנֵי־ <S%H6440><s%> mip-pe-nei-Sha- from שָׁ֝א֗וּל <S%H7586><s%> 'Ul, Saul בַּמְּעָרָֽה׃ <S%H4631><s%> bam-me-'a-Rah. in the cave חָנֵּ֤נִי <S%H2603><s%> chon-ne-ni Be merciful אֱלֹהִ֨ים׀ <S%H430><s%> E-lo-Him unto me O God חָנֵּ֗נִי <S%H2603><s%> chon-ne-ni be merciful כִּ֥י <S%H3588><s%> ki for בְךָ֮ ve-Cha חָסָ֪יָה <S%H2620><s%> cha-Sa-yah trusteth נַ֫פְשִׁ֥י <S%H5315><s%> naf-Shi unto me for my soul וּבְצֵֽל־ <S%H6738><s%> u-ve-tzel- in thee yea in the shadow כְּנָפֶ֥יךָ <S%H3671><s%> ke-na-Fei-cha of thy wings אֶחְסֶ֑ה <S%H2620><s%> 'ech-Seh; will I make my refuge עַ֝֗ד <S%H5704><s%> 'Ad, Until יַעֲבֹ֥ר <S%H5674><s%> ya-'a-Vor be overpast הַוּֽוֹת׃ <S%H1942><s%> hav-Vot. until [these] calamities

אֶ֭קְרָא <S%H7121><s%> 'Ek-ra I will cry לֵֽאלֹהִ֣ים <S%H430><s%> le-lo-Him unto God עֶלְי֑וֹן <S%H5945><s%> el-Yon; most high לָ֝אֵ֗ל <S%H410><s%> la-'El, unto God גֹּמֵ֥ר <S%H1584><s%> go-Mer that performeth עָלָֽי׃ <S%H5921><s%> 'a-Lai. and

יִשְׁלַ֤ח <S%H7971><s%> yish-Lach He shall send מִשָּׁמַ֨יִם׀ <S%H8064><s%> mish-sha-Ma-yim from heaven וְֽיוֹשִׁיעֵ֗נִי <S%H3467><s%> ve-yo-shi-'E-ni, and save חֵרֵ֣ף <S%H2778><s%> che-Ref me [from] the reproach שֹׁאֲפִ֣י <S%H7602><s%> sho-'a-Fi of him that would swallow me up סֶ֑לָה <S%H5542><s%> Se-lah; Selah יִשְׁלַ֥ח <S%H7971><s%> yish-Lach shall send forth אֱ֝לֹהִ֗ים <S%H430><s%> E-lo-Him, God חַסְדּ֥וֹ <S%H2617><s%> chas-Do his mercy וַאֲמִתּֽוֹ׃ <S%H571><s%> va-'a-mit-To. and his truth

נַפְשִׁ֤י׀ <S%H5315><s%> naf-Shi My soul בְּת֥וֹךְ <S%H8432><s%> be-Toch [is] among לְבָאִם֮ <S%H3833><s%> le-va-'Im lions אֶשְׁכְּבָ֪ה <S%H7901><s%> 'esh-ke-Vah [and] I lie לֹ֫הֲטִ֥ים <S%H3857><s%> lo-ha-Tim [even among] them that are set on fire בְּֽנֵי־ <S%H1121><s%> be-nei- [even] the sons אָדָ֗ם <S%H120><s%> 'a-Dam, of men שִׁ֭נֵּיהֶם <S%H8127><s%> nei-hem whose teeth חֲנִ֣ית <S%H2595><s%> cha-Nit [are] spears וְחִצִּ֑ים <S%H2671><s%> ve-chitz-Tzim; and arrows וּ֝לְשׁוֹנָ֗ם <S%H3956><s%> u-le-sho-Nam, and their tongue חֶ֣רֶב <S%H2719><s%> Che-rev sword חַדָּֽה׃ <S%H2299><s%> chad-Dah. a sharp

ר֣וּמָה <S%H7311><s%> Ru-mah Be thou exalted עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- above הַשָּׁמַ֣יִם <S%H8064><s%> hash-sha-Ma-yim above the heavens אֱלֹהִ֑ים <S%H430><s%> E-lo-Him; O God עַ֖ל <S%H5921><s%> 'al above כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> kol- all הָאָ֣רֶץ <S%H776><s%> ha-'A-retz [be] above all the earth כְּבוֹדֶֽךָ׃ <S%H3519><s%> ke-vo-De-cha. [let] thy glory

רֶ֤שֶׁת׀ <S%H7568><s%> Re-shet a net הֵכִ֣ינוּ <S%H3559><s%> he-Chi-nu They have prepared לִפְעָמַי֮ <S%H6471><s%> lif-'a-Mai for my steps כָּפַ֪ף <S%H3721><s%> ka-Faf is bowed down נַ֫פְשִׁ֥י <S%H5315><s%> naf-Shi my soul כָּר֣וּ <S%H3738><s%> ka-Ru they have digged לְפָנַ֣י <S%H6440><s%> le-fa-Nai before שִׁיחָ֑ה <S%H7882><s%> shi-Chah; a pit נָפְל֖וּ <S%H5307><s%> na-fe-Lu whereof they are fallen בְתוֹכָ֣הּ <S%H8432><s%> ve-to-Chah me into the midst סֶֽלָה׃ <S%H5542><s%> Se-lah. [themselves] Selah

נָ֘כ֤וֹן <S%H3559><s%> na-Chon is fixed לִבִּ֣י <S%H3820><s%> lib-Bi My heart אֱ֭לֹהִים <S%H430><s%> E-lo-Him O God נָכ֣וֹן <S%H3559><s%> na-Chon is fixed לִבִּ֑י <S%H3820><s%> lib-Bi; my heart אָ֝שִׁ֗ירָה <S%H7891><s%> 'a-Shi-rah, I will sing וַאֲזַמֵּֽרָה׃ <S%H2167><s%> va-'a-zam-Me-rah. and give praise

ע֤וּרָה <S%H5782><s%> 'U-rah Awake up כְבוֹדִ֗י <S%H3519><s%> che-vo-Di, my glory ע֭וּרָֽה <S%H5782><s%> 'U-rah awake הַנֵּ֥בֶל <S%H5035><s%> han-Ne-vel psaltery וְכִנּ֗וֹר <S%H3658><s%> ve-chin-Nor, and harp אָעִ֥ירָה <S%H5782><s%> 'a-'I-rah I [myself] will awake שָּֽׁחַר׃ <S%H7837><s%> Sha-char. early

אוֹדְךָ֖ <S%H3034><s%> 'od-Cha I will praise בָעַמִּ֥ים׀ <S%H5971><s%> va-'am-Mim among the people אֲדֹנָ֑י <S%H136><s%> 'a-do-Nai; thee O Lord אֲ֝זַמֶּרְךָ֗ <S%H2167><s%> 'a-zam-mer-cha, I will sing בַּל־ <S%H1077><s%> bal- among אֻמִּֽים׃ <S%H3816><s%> 'um-Mim. unto thee among the nations

כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> ki- for גָדֹ֣ל <S%H1419><s%> ga-Dol [is] great עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> 'ad- against שָׁמַ֣יִם <S%H8064><s%> sha-Ma-yim unto the heavens חַסְדֶּ֑ךָ <S%H2617><s%> chas-De-cha; For thy mercy וְֽעַד־ <S%H5704><s%> ve-'ad- against שְׁחָקִ֥ים <S%H7834><s%> she-cha-Kim unto the clouds אֲמִתֶּֽךָ׃ <S%H571><s%> 'a-mit-Te-cha. and thy truth

ר֣וּמָה <S%H7311><s%> Ru-mah Be thou exalted עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- above שָׁמַ֣יִם <S%H8064><s%> sha-Ma-yim above the heavens אֱלֹהִ֑ים <S%H430><s%> E-lo-Him; O God עַ֖ל <S%H5921><s%> 'al above כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> kol- all הָאָ֣רֶץ <S%H776><s%> ha-'A-retz [be] above all the earth כְּבוֹדֶֽךָ׃ <S%H3519><s%> ke-vo-De-cha. [let] thy glory
